title: Create Media Buy Async Response - Input Required
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for create_media_buy when status is 'input-required'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that human approval or input is needed before the operation can proceed.

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy requiring approval. Required for identifying which operation needs attention.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining what approval or input is needed

errors.message: Budget exceeds auto-approval threshold of $100K. Awaiting VP approval before media buy creation.
